dt: {bc}a usually broad, shallow, and open container for domestic use (as for cooking)
{bc}any of various similar usually metal receptacles: such as
{bc}the hollow part of the lock in a firelock or flintlock gun that receives the priming
{bc}either of the receptacles in a pair of scales
{bc}a round shallow usually metal container for separating metal (such as gold) from waste by washing
{bc}a natural basin or depression in land
{bc}a similar artificial basin (as for evaporating brine)
{bc}a drifting fragment of the flat thin ice that forms in bays or along the shore

any of various similar usually metal receptacles: such as

dt: {bc}to wash in a pan for the purpose of separating heavy particles
{bc}to separate (a substance, such as gold) by panning
{bc}to wash material (such as earth or gravel) in a pan in search of metal (such as gold)
{bc}to yield precious metal in the process of panning

shortdef: to wash in a pan for the purpose of separating heavy particles
to separate (a substance, such as gold) by panning
to place in a pan

dt: {bc}a masticatory of betel nut, mineral lime, and pan

shortdef: a betel leaf

dt: {bc}a Greek god of pastures, flocks, and shepherds usually represented as having the legs, horns, and ears of a goat
